name: microservices
description: Example Nestjs microservices with different transports(GRPC, Kafka, Rabbit, NATS)

scripts.install:unix: for dir in */; do if [ "$dir" != "gateway/" ] && [ -e "$dir/package.json" ]; then echo "Installing in $dir" && cd "$dir" && npm install && ( [ "$dir" != "gateway/" ] && npx prisma generate ); cd ..; fi; done
scripts.install:win: PowerShell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Directory | ForEach-Object { if ($_.Name -ne 'gateway' -and (Test-Path $_\package.json)) { Write-Output 'Installing in ' $_.FullName; Set-Location $_; npm install; if ($_.Name -ne 'gateway') { npx prisma generate }; Set-Location .. } }"
